mapper.select: select a.*, b.name from s_goods_detail a inner join s_goods b on a.goods_id = b.id where a.goods_id = #{goodsId}

select b.sku_ids skuIds, b.price, a.quantity, a.amount, c.name, c.cover from s_order_detail a left join s_goods_detail b on a.goods_detail_id = b.id left join s_goods c on b.goods_id = c.id where a.order_no = #{orderNo}
select a.id, a.name, a.images, a.cover, a.description ,b.* from s_goods a left join s_goods_detail b on a.id = b.goods_id where a.goods_id = #{goodsId}
